channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI Can’t Replace Teaching, but It Can Make It Better
item.description: Even techno-optimists hesitate to say teaching is best left to the bots, but there’s a debate about where to draw the line.
